doc.title: Don Don
doc.plot: "Don Don" is the story of two very different men who live on opposite sides of the globe: Don Holmes, a brash and bullish American millionaire with a formidable appetite for self-gratification and excess; and Ajahn Dohn, a wise and noble Thai Buddhist monk who lives a life of compassion and restraint. On the same day, during the same hour, in the same minute both men are told that they are dying, that they have, at best, just one year left to live. The question is, what will they do now that they know this?
